security_audit.summary: Legitimate meta-skill for creating Claude Code skills. Contains Python scripts for skill initialization, validation, and packaging. All scripts perform standard file operations (create, copy, zip) to user-specified directories. No network calls, credential access, or obfuscated code. Risk factors are appropriate for the stated purpose.

content.value_statement: Building Claude Code skills from scratch requires understanding YAML structure, progressive disclosure, validation patterns, and deployment strategies. Skills Factory provides templates, validation scripts, and comprehensive guides so you can create effective skills faster.
actual_capabilities: Initialize new skill directories with YAML templates
Validate skill structure with quick or comprehensive checks
Package skills into zip files for distribution
Install skills to personal or project locations
limitations: Does not execute arbitrary code or make network requests
Requires manual trigger based on description keywords
Skills do not sync across Claude surfaces automatically
Does not generate skill content automatically

best_practices: Start with evaluation-driven development: define test scenarios before building your skill
Apply progressive disclosure: keep SKILL.md under 200 lines, move details to references/
Use validation scripts at every checkpoint to catch errors early
anti_patterns: Don't skip validation: always run comprehensive_validate.py before deploying
Don't over-complicate: simple skills with clear triggers work better than complex ones
Don't forget trigger terms: include specific action verbs and use cases in your description

faq.question: What surfaces support skills?
faq.answer: Claude Code, Claude.ai, Claude Desktop, and Claude API each require separate skill deployment. Skills do not sync automatically.

faq.question: How big can a skill be?
faq.answer: Keep SKILL.md under 200 lines for optimal triggering. Reference files can be larger but should be loaded only when needed.

faq.question: How do I share skills with my team?
faq.answer: For Claude Code, commit skills to .claude/skills/ in your git repo. For Claude.ai/Desktop, share the zip package. For API, upload via endpoint.

faq.question: Is my data safe with this skill?
faq.answer: Yes. Skills Factory only creates and validates skill files. It makes no network calls and does not access credentials or sensitive data.

faq.question: Why is my skill not triggering?
faq.answer: Check that skill name matches directory name, YAML frontmatter is valid, and description includes specific trigger terms like action verbs and use cases.

faq.question: How is this different from skill-creator?
faq.answer: Skills Factory focuses on production quality with validation scripts, two-Claude iteration methodology, and comprehensive deployment guides.
